mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT BIKE_NO FROM spb.TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = LOCATE_ID) AS bikeNo, DATE_FORMAT(LOCATE_STR_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS locateStrDttm, LOCATE_ADMIN_ID AS locateAdminId, DATE_FORMAT(LOCATE_END_DTTM ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS locateEndDttm, LOCATE_END_ADMIN_ID AS locateEndAdminId FROM TB_IOT_TERMINAL_LOCATE_INFO WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId} AND LOCATE_CLS_CD = 'B' #AND LOCATE_END_DTTM <> STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND DATE_FORMAT(LOCATE_STR_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(LOCATE_END_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY LOCATE_ID

SELECT COUNT(A.DEVICE_ID) FROM TB_IOT_TERMINAL_LOCATE_INFO WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId} AND LOCATE_CLS_CD = 'B' #AND LOCATE_END_DTTM <> STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND DATE_FORMAT(LOCATE_STR_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(LOCATE_END_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate} ,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT LOCATE_ID AS centerSeq , LOCATE_CLS_CD AS locateClsCd , DEVICE_ID AS deviceId FROM TB_IOT_TERMINAL_LOCATE_INFO WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId} AND LOCATE_END_DTTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
